title: Science Content Design Course Based on Multimedia Learning Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Customized multimedia learning design competency development for adult learners in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Students can design science concept explanation materials by applying text-image integration principles
Students can adjust learning content volume based on cognitive load theory
Students can produce smartphone-optimized multimedia materials to improve adult learners' comprehension by 20%

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
